text: Kenekai cukti balabat thakiba? Athaca sihamte yadi tomalokara oparata bijaya labha karae tente sihamte tomalokara atmiyatara arau angikarara kono maryada nidiba; sihamte kerala mukheraehe tomalokaka santusta karae; kintu sihamtara hrdaye seya asbikara karae; arau sihamtara adhikansa'i phachikba
